definition: (used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
abbr. for Xiamen or Amoy 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2], Fujian
Jin Mao Tower, skyscraper in Shanghai
great mansion on the verge of collapse (idiom); hopeless situation

pinyin: Niu3 yue1 Di4 guo2 Da4 sha4

sentences.english: There’re blue sky，beautiful trees and big buildings ahead.
sentences.chinese: 晴空丽日，前面是婀娜多姿的树木和高楼大厦。

sentences.english: Jin Mao Tower was completed in 1999 and is the fourth tallest building of the world.
sentences.chinese: 金茂大厦于1999年完工，是世界第四高的建筑物。

sentences.english: Office in Huainan City, Chaoyang Road, Ruijin Building, 23rd Floor.
sentences.chinese: 办公于淮南市朝阳路瑞金大厦23楼。

sentences.english: She still thinks he was the culprit of torching his Long Island mansion.
sentences.chinese: 她仍然认为50分是燃烧他的长岛大厦的罪魁祸首。

sentences.english: A: Yes, do you have any particular buildings in Kowloon Bay in mind?
sentences.chinese: 可以，在九龙湾你有没有特别指定的工业大厦？

sentences.english: Monitor took the plane crashed into the Pentagon .
sentences.chinese: 监视器拍下飞机撞进五角大厦的瞬间。

sentences.english: It’s on TV, like watching the movie“Independent day”(ID4) I can’t imagine how many people are working in the building it’s really horrible, I felt sad.
sentences.chinese: 我不敢想象有多少人正在大厦里工作，太恐怖了。

sentences.english: Room 905, Jinli Mansion, No. 115 Beizhan Road, Shenhe District, Shenyang.
sentences.chinese: 沈阳市沈河区北站路115号金利大厦905室。

sentences.english: Three helipads are on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 大厦顶部有三个直升机停机坪。

sentences.english: B: Do you have the floor plan of the building?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有这大厦的平面图？

sentences.english: Maizidian Xijie, Sanyuanqiao, Across from Xinhengji Tower on Women's Street.
sentences.chinese: 麦子店西街9号，三元桥，女人街新恒基大厦路口。

sentences.english: Eastbound East Road in Chaoyang District, located at the International Trade Building, 100 meters.
sentences.chinese: 大厦位于朝阳区东三环国贸桥东100米。

sentences.english: They will go to United Nations mansion of visiting New York.
sentences.chinese: 他们要去参观纽约的联合国大厦。

sentences.english: The portal of the mansion looks magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 这座大厦的正门看上去富丽堂皇。

sentences.english: Did they do this a long time ago?
sentences.chinese: 他们在很久以前建造摩天大厦吗？

sentences.english: The Wong Tai Sin Temple is much older than the surrounding high-rise buildings.
sentences.chinese: 黄大仙祠比较周围的高楼大厦年代久远得多。

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1
